title: PayPal Payment Integration
description: As a customer, I want to pay using PayPal so that I can use my existing PayPal balance or linked accounts without entering card details.
acceptance_criteria: PayPal option is displayed at checkout
User is redirected to PayPal for authentication
Payment status is updated in real-time
User is redirected back to order confirmation page
System handles PayPal payment cancellations gracefully
Transaction IDs are stored for refund purposes

comments.author: Developer
comments.text: Using PayPal REST API v2. Sandbox testing completed successfully.

comments.author: QA Engineer
comments.text: All test scenarios passed. Ready for production deployment.
